Detailed Description

Base class for the most of the views of the application (ClusterView, WaveformView, CorrelationView and ErrorMatrixView).

This class defineds the views common signal and slot communication with KlustersView. Thoses communication enable the views to be update themselves when the clusters have been changed. ViewWidget also contains the zoom feature of the views.

Author:
Lynn Hazan

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Enum to be use as a Mode.

  • DELETE_NOISE Enumeration indicating that the user is in a mode enabling him to delete noisy spikes.
  • DELETE_ARTEFACT Enumeration indicating that the user is in a mode enabling him to delete artefact spikes.
  • NEW_CLUSTER Enumeration indicating that the user is in a mode enabling him to create a new cluster.
  • NEW_CLUSTERS Enumeration indicating that the user is in a mode enabling him to create new clusters.
  • SELECT_TIME Enumeration indicating that the user is in a mode enabling him to select a time window which will be display in a TraceView.

virtual void ViewWidget::updateClusters ( QValueList< int > &  modifiedClusters,
bool  active,
bool  isModifiedByDeletion 
) [inline, virtual, slot]

Updates the clusters which have been modified by the suppression of spikes (used to create a new cluster or simply move to the cluster of noise or artefact).

This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.

Parameters:
modifiedClusters list of clusters from which spikes were taken from.
active true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.
isModifiedByDeletion true if the clusters of modifiedClusters have been modified by the deletion of spikes (moved to cluster 0 or 1, cluster of artefact abd cluster of noise respectively).

Reimplemented in ClusterView, CorrelationView, and WaveformView.

virtual void ViewWidget::undoUpdateClusters ( QValueList< int > &  modifiedClusters,
bool  active 
) [inline, virtual, slot]

Updates the clusters which have been modified by the suppression of spikes (used to create a new cluster or simply move to the cluster of noise or artefact).

This method is called only during an undo otherwise the updateClusters is call. There are 2 functions in order to reduce the number of clusters to draw whenever possible.

Parameters:
modifiedClusters list of clusters from which spikes were taken from.
active true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

Reimplemented in ClusterView, CorrelationView, and WaveformView.
